        textLeft - Placement of paragraph starting on left
        textBottom - Placement of paragraph bottom
        textRight - Placement of the right side of paragraph
        pdf - Pdf being created
        document - Document being written on
        inputText - Inputted text
        textColour - Colour of text
        bold - True if text is bold, false if if not
        pgCount - Number of pages
        font - Name of font
        numFontSize - Font size
